403.description: The requestor does not have the required permissions for the gateway's space.

parameters.name: agentAction
parameters.description: The type of action to perform. Permitted values are `restart` (will not restart the agent if a reload is in `RELOADING` status) and `force-restart` (will restart the agent even if a reload is in `RELOADING` status).

post.description: Restarts the specified agent. If a reload is in `RELOADING` status the `restart` action will be ignored. Use `force-restart` to restart the agent even if a reload is in `RELOADING` status. Requestor must be assigned the `TenantAdmin` role and needs to be either a Gateway's space owner or a member in the Gateway's space with `Can Consume Data` role. Available in Direct Access Gateway V1.7.2+.

201.description: Benchmark task created successfully with a unique identifier.

403.description: The requestor does not have the required permissions for the gateway's space.

500.description: There was an error processing the request.

501.description: All or part of the request has not yet been implemented.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Forces the benchmark to start regardless of the state of the agent. Does not override QCS resource limits. Use with caution.

parameters.name: gigaBytesToTransfer
parameters.description: The volume of data in GB to transfer during the throughput measurement part of the benchmark.

post.description: Starts a background benchmark task to measure the performance of a Direct Access agent. Use this endpoint to evaluate agent throughput and latency for capacity planning and performance optimization. Requestor must be assigned the `TenantAdmin` role and needs to be either a Gateway's space owner or a member in the Gateway's space with `Can Consume Data` role. Available in Direct Access Gateway V1.7.8+.

200.description: Benchmark status and performance metrics retrieved successfully.

403.description: The requestor does not have the required permissions for the gateway's space.

500.description: There was an error processing the request.

get.description: Retrieves the current status and progress of a running or completed benchmark task. Use this endpoint to monitor benchmark execution and retrieve performance metrics once the task is completed. Requestor must be assigned the `TenantAdmin` role and needs to be either a Gateway's space owner or a member in the Gateway's space with `Can Consume Data` role. Available in Direct Access Gateway V1.7.8+.

post.summary: Requests a cancellation on a running benchmark

403.description: The requestor does not have the required permissions for the gateway's space.

500.description: There was an error processing the request.

post.description: Requests a cancellation on a running benchmark by id for the specified agent. Requestor must be assigned the `TenantAdmin` role and needs to be either a Gateway's space owner or a member in the Gateway's space with `Can Consume Data` role. Available in Direct Access Gateway V1.7.8+.

200.description: The dictionary of key/value pairs retrieved from the configuration file.

parameters.name: queryProperties
parameters.description: Individual properties within the agent configuration

get.description: Retrieves the connector agent configuration from the specified agent. Requestor must be assigned the `TenantAdmin` role and needs to be either a Gateway's space owner or a member in the Gateway's space with `Can Consume Data` role. Available in Direct Access Gateway V1.7.2+.

207.description: Patch applied, validation results show success or failure of each individual patch operation.

403.description: The requestor does not have the required permissions for the gateway's space.

415.description: Unsupported content-type. This endpoint must include `application/json` as a valid content-type for API compliance, but C# JsonPatchDocument doesn't support it. Requests must use `application/json-patch+json`.

patch.description: Makes changes to the local agent configuration using JSON Patch. Requestor must be assigned the `TenantAdmin` role and needs to be either a Gateway's space owner or a member in the Gateway's space with `Can Consume Data` role. Available in Direct Access Gateway V1.7.2+.

200.description: The list of files for the specified connector.

403.description: The requestor does not have the required permissions for the gateway's space.

parameters.name: connectorType
parameters.description: The connector to retrieve the list of files for

get.description: Retrieves the configuration files associated with the connector. Requestor must be assigned the `TenantAdmin` role and needs to be either a Gateway's space owner or a member in the Gateway's space with `Can Consume Data` role. Available in Direct Access Gateway V1.7.4+.

200.description: The list of configuration values from the file.

403.description: The requestor does not have the required permissions for the gateway's space.

parameters.name: fileType
parameters.description: The type of file to retrieve

get.description: Retrieves the configuration items in the flat file for the specified connector. Requestor must be assigned the `TenantAdmin` role and needs to be either a Gateway's space owner or a member in the Gateway's space with `Can Consume Data` role. Available in Direct Access Gateway V1.7.4+.

put.description: Completely replaces the contents of the connector's configuration file. Partial updates are not supported. Requestor must be assigned the `TenantAdmin` role and needs to be either a Gateway's space owner or a member in the Gateway's space with `Can Consume Data` role. Available in Direct Access Gateway V1.7.4+.

requestBody.description: The contents of the file to be updated

get.summary: Get file connector allowed paths configuration

200.description: The list of configuration values from the file.

get.description: Retrieves the allowed paths settings for the File Connector. Requestor must be assigned the `TenantAdmin` role. Available in Direct Access Gateway V1.7.6+.

put.description: Completely replaces the contents of the allowed paths configuration file for the File Connector. Partial updates are not supported. Requestor must be assigned the `TenantAdmin` role. Available in Direct Access Gateway V1.7.6+.

requestBody.description: The contents of the file to be updated

200.description: The list of configuration values from the file.

get.description: Retrieves the custom data type mapping settings for the Generic ODBC Connector. Requestor must be assigned the `TenantAdmin` role. Available in Direct Access Gateway V1.7.5+.

put.description: Completely replaces the contents of the custom data type mapping configuration file for the Generic ODBC connector. Partial updates are not supported. There are property naming differences between the API and the file contents. Use the API property format when making changes. Requestor must be assigned the `TenantAdmin` role. Available in Direct Access Gateway V1.7.5+.

requestBody.description: The contents of the file to be updated.

200.description: The list of configuration values from the file.

get.description: Retrieves the settings for the metrics collector. Requestor must be assigned the `TenantAdmin` role. Available in Direct Access Gateway V1.7.9+.

put.description: Completely replaces the contents of the metrics collector settings configuration file. Partial updates are not supported.  Requestor must be assigned the `TenantAdmin` role. Available in Direct Access Gateway V1.7.9+.

requestBody.description: The contents of the file to be updated.

path.description: The Path property in the File connector allowed paths file.

spaces.description: The Spaces property in the Odbc custom type mappings file.

statusMessage.description: Additional details about the benchmark status

benchmarkEndTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted timestamp when the benchmark task completed or was cancelled

benchmarkStartTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted timestamp when the benchmark task started execution

totalBytesRequested.description: The total bytes requested to be transferred during the benchmark

latency.description: The latency in ms measured during data transmission

throughput.description: The data throughput in KB/s measured during data transmission

totalBytesTransferred.description: The total number of bytes successfully transferred during data transmission

dataTransmissionEndTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted timestamp when data transmission completed

dataTransmissionStartTime.description: The ISO 8601 formatted timestamp when data transmission start

href.description: The URL to the related resource

scrapeIntervalSeconds.description: Frequency in seconds at which metrics are collected from this connector.

metricsCollectionEnabled.description: Indicates whether metrics collection is enabled for this connector.

scrapeIntervalSeconds.description: Frequency in seconds at which metrics are collected from this connector.

metricsCollectionEnabled.description: Indicates whether metrics collection is enabled for this connector.

port.description:
The port number that the metrics collector API will run on.
This must match the port that the SYSTEM connector runs on to enable network metrics collection.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the metrics collector is enabled.

localDataRetentionDays.description: The number of days to retain local data.

baseScrapeIntervalSeconds.description:
The base interval in seconds for the metrics collection loop.
This defines how frequently the collector checks whether to scrape each connector, not the interval at which each connector is scraped. Must be equal to or less than the lowest individual connector scrape interval.

localDatabaseFileLocation.description: The file location for the local metrics database. If not specified, defaults to `C:\ProgramData\Qlik\Gateway\tmp`.

dataRetentionCheckIntervalMinutes.description: The interval in minutes the metrics collector checks for and deletes old data.

id.description: The Identifier property in the ODBC custom data type mapping file.

bit.description: The IsBit property in the ODBC custom data type mapping file.

size.description: The Size property in the ODBC custom data type mapping file.

qlikDataType.description: The QlikDataType property in the ODBC custom data type mapping file.

nativeDataType.description: The NativeDataType property in the ODBC custom data type mapping file.

items.description: Individual lines of the file. Must be escaped when sending as json.

UpdateConfigurationFlatFileRequest.description: The request to update a connector flat file

UpdateFileConnectorAllowedPathsRequest.description: The request to update file connector allowed paths configuration

port.description:
The port number that the metrics collector API will run on.
This must match the port that the SYSTEM connector runs on to enable network metrics collection.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the metrics collector is enabled.

localDataRetentionDays.description: The number of days to retain local data.

baseScrapeIntervalSeconds.description:
The base interval in seconds for the metrics collection loop.
This defines how frequently the collector checks whether to scrape each connector, not the interval at which each connector is scraped. Must be equal to or less than the lowest individual connector scrape interval.

localDatabaseFileLocation.description: The file location for the local metrics database. If not specified, defaults to `C:\ProgramData\Qlik\Gateway\tmp`.

dataRetentionCheckIntervalMinutes.description: The interval in minutes the metrics collector checks for and deletes old data.

region.description: The region the tenant is hosted in

tenant.description: Name of the tenant that will be called
